section.title: Reserved Words
section.p: These words are reserved for the query language and may not be used as identifiers. The words with asterisk (*) after them are not currently used by , but are reserved for future implementation.

entry.codeblock: abs* all and andthen* any* array as asc avg* bag* boolean by byte char collection count date declare* define* desc
dictionary distinct double element enum* except* exists* false first* flatten* float for* from group* having* import in int intersect* interval*
is_defined is_undefined last* like limit list* listtoset* long map max* min* mod* nil not null nvl octet or order
orelse* query* select set short some* string struct* sum* time timestamp to_date true type undefine* undefined union* unique* where

section.p: To access any method, attribute, or named object that has the same name as a query language reserved word, enclose the name within double quotation marks.
Examples: SELECT DISTINCT "type" FROM /portfolios WHERE status = 'active' SELECT DISTINCT * FROM /region1 WHERE emps."select"() < 100000
